title: The Sweetest Revenge
description: When Zane Cordon finds out that his wife of ten years have not only been cheating on him but that she had also gotten rid of his unborn children along the way heâ€™s out for revenge. His mind becomes consumed with the best way of getting back at her as he sees his chances at fatherhood slipping away.Then one day he meets the young hot Elena Patriakis and things take a different turn as everything he thought now out of his reach was suddenly right there at his fingertips.
author: Jordan Silver
